author: itv.com
title: Travel: Systemwide delays on the Tyne and Wear Metro | Tyne Tees
text:
The Tyne and Wear Metro have reported systemwide delays due to a points failure on Network Rail Infrastructure.
Tyne and Wear Metro @My_Metro Follow Delays of up to 25 mins to trains running between Pelaw and South Shields and South Hylton due to a points failure.
06:23 - 2 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Wed 2 Sep 2015 Travel Tyne and Wear Tyne and Wear Metro
